Crack Babies - Are U On Crack demo 1993

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 24, 2016 Description from Terminal Escape:
Weirdo Pennsylvania (I think?) shitpunk from 1993. I'm not gonna lie, this shit is for the hyper curious and dedicated purists only...are you gonna do it? ARE U ON CRACK?
